page.title: 05FURLONGS FARM
page.content: The owners of{FURLONGS FARM}own 160 acres of land and grow potatoes,barley and wheat.They have worked on the farm for four years.The animals that are kept on the farm are chickens,geese,cows and hens.The people on the farm have to get up at six o_clock and they have to feed all the animals before starting their own eggs.For the hens was a big pen and when they are old enough to lay eggs they go into a special place . For the cows there is a very big sheltered hut.It is very muddy and it has to be cleaned out twice a week.The geese also have a little hut.It is covered in straw and in the middle is a big nest.It takes about one month for the baby geese to hatch out.
